alert.note: Alert for Barnes; Cass; Steele; Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 11:36AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Cass, southwestern Traill, northeastern Barnes and southern Steele Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1136 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Colgate, or 26 miles northeast of Valley City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Colgate around 1140 AM CDT. Clifford and Galesburg around 1200 PM CDT. Roseville around 1205 PM CDT. Blanchard around 1215 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
